content: *light and airy bag perfect for running errands in the summer shown in bernat handicrafter cotton yarnspirations * lily® sugar n cream® naturals solids 400 g/14 oz #27003 off white **1 ball** *or* lily® sugar n cream® naturals ombres/prints 340 g/12 oz #33013 chocolate ombre **2 balls** or #33018 sonoma print **2 balls** 3¼ yards 3 m of cord 3/8 inch 9 5 mm in diameter *lily sugar n cream free project sheet 99000600311* *summer totes crochet * english *fourre-tout pour l été au crochet * french *ed note french version is not yet available online*
